409230.name: Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 - ART+OST
409230.description:
The theme for the desktop, which consists of 12 atmospheric arts of the World War I. And the soundtrack from the game Battle of Empires: 1914-1918 with the possibility of installing ring tones on mobile phones.
Official Soundtrack:
01 Enter the Doom
02 Hopeless
03 Prepare Yourself
04 In the Trench
05 A Cold Night
05 Copper and Dirt
06 Nothing Quite Close
07 Too Good To Be True
08 Hope and Bravery
09 Resist and Conquer
10 Beware
11 In the Mud
12 Is this Victory
13 Eon Tree
14 Last Prayer
15 Teaser track
16 Winter Stealth
17 GallipolI
409230.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
